headline.main: SHIP BANS REPEAL IS DUE THIS WEEK; Connally Is 'Sure' of 50 Votes in Senate Ballot Expected Wednesday, '55 Probable'

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 2 -- The vital sections of the Neutrality Act will be repealed by the Senate this week and American merchant vessels will be carrying munitions into British ports within a month, Administration leaders in Congress predicted tonight.
abstract: Sen Connally expects ship arming and war zones sees repeal
